title: Where can I purchase Torino Flair?
content: If you're looking for the italic, Jukebox's [Cavetto](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124143/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?image=JBT0001000) (the italic flair version) is very similar. I wouldn't be surprised if Torino Italic Flair was its source of inspiration. As for the roman version, I don't think anything like it exists digitally.
author: Mark Simonson
